title: November 27, 2010
content:
Katherine Hughes represents the best of citizen activism, defending civil liberties since age 14. <!--more--> It “prompted her” to become an ACLU court watcher throughout Dr Rafil Dhafir’s entire 17 week rigged 2004-05 trial.
A true humanitarian, he nonetheless was convicted on 59 of 60 counts and sentenced to 22 years in prison for being Muslim at the wrong time in America.
That topic and the latest information on Dhafir’s appeal will be discussed.
Follow it as well on Hughes’ web site - dhafirtrial.
net.
